EmailTemplate.description: Send from the Training Event to Managers ONLY if you couldn't contact for the Pre-Onboarding Reachout. There is OPT OUT instructions included.
EmailTemplate.name: 0.1 Manager Reachout Pre-Onboarding Questionnaire
EmailTemplate.subject: Sales Onboarding Manager Questionnaire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations on your new hire!
Please follow this link to complete Sales Onboarding Manager Questionnaire and return to me as soon as possible: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScW_BPEQkAddvQkKsAr8YV5ccdTKXVVDpG39jb5VSloHljC4Q/viewform?authuser=0
If your new hire will not be attending Sales Onboarding, please respond "OPT OUT" to this email.
Contact me with any questions.
{!User.Name}
WEX Global Sales Training
